Notes: An area that applies bloom effects to compatible objects inside it. For this, the object needs a Bloom.arc model file. However, not all objects support this natively.

Obj_arg0.Name: Intensity
Obj_arg0.Description: Strength of the bloom effect. Ranges from 0 to 255. Default is 128.

Obj_arg1.Name: Threshold
Obj_arg1.Description: Brightness filter level. Ranges from 0 to 255. Default is 255.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
